Reviews.Title: Would give it no stars if possible
Reviews.Author: Wendy Harris "wharris"
Reviews.Content: I purchased cameras for all of my kids for our trip to Disney World.  They each received their cameras on their preceding birthdays.  My youngest's birthday was just a week before our departure date.  Immediately after we opened the package we were finding problems.  In order to change the batteries (which must be rechargable and run out quickly) you have to remove two screws--not practical for daily changing.  Then, the previews on the LCD monitor were all "oversxposed".  There isn't a way to turn off the flash so there was no way to resolve the issue.  We also had difficulty with the software that came with the product. I contacted the company and they were rude and useless.  I am very dissastisfied.  The camera is going back and I will be purchasing something else before our trip--money I did not plan on spending.

Reviews.Title: Piece of "you know what!" Just awful!!!
Reviews.Author: Susan J
Reviews.Content: This is the worst piece of technology I've ever encountered. To President and CEO of Crayola LLC, Mark J. Schwab and the rest of your management team, Dona Fisher, VP and CFO and Thomas J. Owens, VP, Operations...do you know how absolutely worthless this camera is?!?!? The creators of this camera deserve to be fired for the trying to pass this off as a camera. My husband is having a hard time installing the software because it just doesn't work, and mind you he is a Senior SystemS Administrator in IT, the sounds of the buttons are obnoxious and the camera takes such poor quality pictures that delete after the camera is shut off. SHAME ON YOU Crayola LLC for trying market such a worthless item to young children. Save your money and DON'T BUY THIS CAMERA!!! I wish I could give this MINUS 5 stars if I could! Thanks for ruining my son's Christmas present.

Reviews.Title: DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY
Reviews.Author: Tiffany
Reviews.Content: Both of my daughters for Christmas.  I purchased the first one on sale and the other at full price.  I took them out of the packages.  I wanted them to be able to use the cameras right away when they opened them on Christmas this year.  I put the batteries in the camera, which was difficult because the batteries are held in by two very small screws that are hard to remove.  Once I got the camera together, I decided to test it out.  The photo quality was absolutly horrible.  I took a picture of my cat and it looked like a blob with lightes shooting out.  My boyfriend then attempted to take a photo of me at optimal 5ft distance.  You can only recognize the shape of the person, not the person in the photo.  Needless to say, one of the cameras is going right back to the store.  Unfortunately since they were purchased and opened at different times, I only have the packaging for one camera.  I plan on giving my 2 year old the camera we are keeping, so she can get used to taking care of something.  Hopefully it is at least durable.  I wouldn't waste my money on this product if I were you.  Lessons learned, do your research before you purchase.

Reviews.Title: I wish I could rate it 0 stars
Reviews.Author: M. Howard
Reviews.Content: It's a horrible camera, the minute the batteries get low and sometimes when it gets shut off you loose all the pictures. Got if for my daughter when she was 6 and it did nothing but break her heart as every time she took photos and got into they just got deleted before we got home to upload them to the computer. Don't buy this camera!

Reviews.Title: great for my four year old.
Reviews.Author: D. Cook
Reviews.Content: i'm surprised to read all of these horrible reviews. we have enjoyed the camera.PROS---easy to use for my four year old. loved the simple buttons.-pictures are ok once downloaded to the computer-i don't think the LCD screen is as bad as other reviews. it's fine.-i also have had no problems with loosing pictures from the memory. my daughter deletes all the bad ones and it keeps about 20-30.-we've used it a lot for two days and the batteries are still fine (energizer).-easy to grip. my four-year-old hasn't dropped it yet.-my three-year-old has dropped it and it didn't break.-she loves the sounds.-software was fun. she loved making a book. super easy to use the projects.-i like that the batteries are under screws and away from prying little fingers.CONS----the FLASH! it's way too bright and the close-ups are flooded. we ended up putting a finger over it most of the time.--the projects on the software are great, but the editing software isn't much different than photoshop. i thought it would be easier.overall, it has been fun.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy
Reviews.Author: Jessica Policastro "Tidbit"
Reviews.Content: Please don't buy this camera.  It is a big dissapointment.  I was not expecting much since it is a kid's camera, but it was so much further from even my loswet expectations.  Firts of all the prewview screen had a sticker over it and it took a lot of work peeling it off.  Then every picture taken was unviewable.  I was not sure what they were of and I took half of them myslef.  It also ate battieries like crazy.  My kids enjoyed it for about an hour before they wre total junk and unusable.  I didn't even get to the point of hooking them up to the computer, i packed them up and took them back to the store the next day.  I am pretty dissapointed in all the kids cameras that are out there today - is even 2.0 megapixles too much to ask for?  Or something that lets them take a decent picture and enjoy the experience.  Anyway - don't waste your time and money on this camera.

Reviews.Title: The worst camera ever!!!!
Reviews.Author: P. E. C. Valdes
Reviews.Content: My daughter received this camera as a Christmas gift.  I wish I have read other people comments before buying it.  The images in almost all the pictures cannot be distinguish, some are blured dark images and when using the flash they look like a white ghostly figure.  Also the software is not at all what we expected and what was advertised.  DON'T BUY THIS CAMERA!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Poor quality.  Don't buy this!
Reviews.Author: Lyle A.
Reviews.Content: Software and drivers are difficult to install and use.  It took three attempts with the drivers before my computer would recognize the camera.The camera is actually worse than the software!  Batteries discharge very quickly (< 20 pics), and without any warning.  This means my daughter loses all of her pictures before she has a chance to download them.  Even when she manages to download a picture, the quality is awful.

Reviews.Title: Misconception
Reviews.Author: Richard Scheff
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 2 year old.  The problem with picture quality is greatly exaggerated.  Yes the photos have a hot spot when the flash is used, so the trick is simple.  Put a piece of tape over half the flash.  It fixes the problem.  That is why I give this camera 3 stars.  Because you do have to modify it with tape since there is no flash setting.The included software is a bit slow in editing the pictures, but my 2 year old is still too young to use a PC.  My plan is to let her use the camera until it breaks and then get her a new one.  But the picture quality is descent for $30.She loves the camera and loves taking pictures, I don't think picture quality maters that much to her anyways.

Reviews.Title: pictures look like they're drawn by crayon
Reviews.Author: J. Park "Amazon Junkie"
Reviews.Content: The very low resolution preview screen is one thing I could live with, but the quality of the pictures taken is frighteningly poor.  This one's going back.  In 2008 when you can by a 8 megapixel camera for about twice the price, how can they try to run this by parents?  Even a kid who doesn't know any better would be disappointed after uploading these pictures to a computer and viewing true image quality.

Reviews.Title: terrible
Reviews.Author: Alan Broom
Reviews.Content: Bought two of these, one for each child, for Christmas. Don't waste your money. The picture the ads show for the preview image is doctored. False advertising if you ask me! The preview image is so poor you can't tell what you are looking at. I agree with the other poor reviews. This product will basically just fluster your child and be tossed aside immediately. Don't buy it. I'm not sure which kid friendly camera to go with, but this one misleads terribly.

Reviews.Title: Horrible
Reviews.Author: Jamie in Washington
Reviews.Content: I purcased this camera as the final gift for my daughter. I thought the idea of her being able to use it and then editting the pics with the included software sounded like a great intro into scrapbooking with me. It turns on and then immediately back off. You have to do a combo of pushing the power button to get it to stay on. Then, the photos are terrible. My daughter packed it around for 1/2 an hour trying to figure it out and then lost all hope and it went by the wayside.SAVE YOUR MONEY FOR A Fisher Price Kid Tough Digital Camera.

Reviews.Title: Horrible customer service
Reviews.Author: Quality shopper
Reviews.Content: We got this camera for our daughter for Christmas and the software CD didn't work.  I have since called the company FIVE TIMES to ask them to replace the CD so we could use the design software for her photos and they say they will send us a replacement and still SIX MONTHS LATER - WE HAVE YET TO RECEIVE THE REPLACEMENT CD!  I purchased this at Costco and will be returning it to them since we have never been able to use the defective CD. I WILL NEVER BUY ANYTHING WITH THE SAKAR NAME ON IT - SEEING FIRST HAND HOW LOUSY THEIR CUSTOMER SERVICE IS!

Reviews.Title: Not a good gift!
Reviews.Author: M. Moses "MaryMo"
Reviews.Content: My daughter received this for her birthday today.  She was so excited, so we opened it right away and put batteries in it for her.  First of all, once the camera is on, you have to hold the button down for several seconds before it will actually take a picture, so most of the pics that she took were of headless people or the floor.  Then, if you press the delete button (it's green with an X on it) twice, then it will erase the pictures.  Of course she doesn't remember that she's not supposed to press THAT button.  There are only five buttons on the camera, so of course any kid is going to be pressing all of the buttons trying to figure out what they do.  So, now my daughter is in bed and I'm cleaning up and notice that the LCD screen is still on.  I push the power button and it won't turn off.  Also, the pictures that are on the camera cannot be downloaded (I tried).  I haven't experienced if it erases the pics when the camera is turned off, because it won't turn off.  This will be returned to the store tomorrow.  What a waste of money!  I won't be exchanging it for another, that's for sure!

Reviews.Title: Stopped working before taking any photos
Reviews.Author: Kristin T
Reviews.Content: I bought the camera because it looked durable - packaging can be deceiving I guess. Because before we were even able to take any photos it completely stopped working.  Tried changing the batteries and nothing.  Wish I would have read the other reviews and saved some money !! Guess it wouldnt have mattered if we'd taken photos anyways, from the sounds of it I could draw better pictures :). And of course I cant find the packaging to take it back.

Reviews.Title: crayola camera
Reviews.Author: Pamela M. Dingee
Reviews.Content: Was disappointed with this.  My granddaughers had a hard time using it.  It wasn't as easy as was suggested.

Reviews.Title: Okay for a toddler, but horrible at using all battery juice too soon!
Reviews.Author: Fish Cake
Reviews.Content: First off the camera is a worst nightmare with running out of battery power too soon. In the long run this camera is to expensive with batteries.I bought Crayola digital camera item #23072 at Wal-mart. I unfortunately bought it for $40 there, I could have saved $10 buying it from amazon.Software with the camera isn't compatible with windows vista, however I was able to download the program from the products website that works with windows vista at [...] Camera's flash is too bright. Picture quality is okay if your in the right surroundings of light.

Reviews.Title: DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY
Reviews.Author: Enrique San Miguel
Reviews.Content: Screen is so small you cant see the picture.  The quality of the downloaded picture is HORRIBLE. Dont buy it.  Trust the reviews on this site

Reviews.Title: Package issues
Reviews.Author: Juanita Pflugh
Reviews.Content: When we received this product the package was partially opened. The plastic was cracked and it looked like someone drop and kicked the package across the floor. We received the package after the projected delivery date.  We are not so happy with this shipment at all.

Reviews.Title: great little camera.
Reviews.Author: melrose lady "nettie"
Reviews.Content: My grandson has special needs but this camera was a delight for him.  His aim wasn't always the best, but he was so excited and it kept his interest longer than usual. and because it is digital, no expense for film and no waiting to see results.

Reviews.Title: Best kid camera on the market!
Reviews.Author: Ron McBride
Reviews.Content: My grandson loves this camera. It was tested to be kid proof and survived a throw down stairs. He is three and the handles help him hold the camera the way it should be to improve picture quality. As a professional photographer I thought this would start him off. It has. I recommend this camera to any parent who wants to combine a toy and a useful tool.

Reviews.Title: can't download photos
Reviews.Author: Ryan Engelland "ME"
Reviews.Content: We cannot get the software to work on our Mac - so sad we cannot download my daughters' photos.  They received 2 of these for Christmas.  I'm disappointed my mother-in-law spent so much money, and now, no photos!  Cameras are not as much fun when you can't see the photos on the computer or print them out or save them!

ProductInfo.Features:
3-in-1 digital camera
VGA resolution with 1.3" preview screen
Includes colorgenie(tm) photo editing software
Features photo creator, puppet creator, game center & edit center activity centers
1-year warranty
VGA resolution with 1.3" preview screen
Features photo creator, puppet creator, game center & edit center activity centers
ProductInfo.Name: Digital Concepts 23072 Crayola VGA Camera with 1.1 Preview Screen (color may vary)
